prediction_points.explanation: 6 > 5, so we take 5 from the right array. The merge always takes the smaller front element.
prediction_points.hint: Compare front elements: 6 vs 5. Take the smaller one.
prediction_points.question: Merging [6] and [5]. Which element is selected first?
